subject: Football
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Prisons and Prisoners
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: Philadelphia Eagles Coach Andy Reid insisted that he would not resign, a day after a judge sentenced his two sons to prison and likened his home to a “drug emporium.”
snippet: Philadelphia Eagles Coach Andy Reid insisted that he would not resign, a day after a judge sentenced his two sons to prison and likened his home to a “drug emporium.”
